Name: Super Gloves Hero
About the game: Click your way through 94 levels of 3d blocks blasting! Rotate, melt, break, blow up blocks to master your way to the top. Can you save the Shubby planet from the most dangerous pirate spaceship? *94 levels of pure madness! *Boost your gloves *Super exciting mode: the Victorious road *Unique gameplay
